meanings.sent1: My father taught me how to ride a bike.
meanings.sent2: The father lion protects his cubs in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The father bird showed his chicks how to fly.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree is the father of the forest, providing shade and shelter.
meanings.sent5: The father's love is like a warm hug on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To be the creator, founder, or originator of something.
meanings.sent1: He will father a new invention that will change the world.
meanings.sent2: The artist will father a masterpiece that will be admired for generations.
meanings.sent3: The chef will father a delicious recipe that everyone will love.
meanings.sent4: Her groundbreaking research will father a new era of scientific discovery.
meanings.sent5: The writer will father a captivating story that will capture readers' hearts.

meanings.definition: A title of respect for an older man.
meanings.sent1: The wise father of the village was always there to offer advice.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, the village elder is referred to as father.
meanings.sent3: The kind father of the town was known for his generosity.
meanings.sent4: The respected father of the community was a pillar of strength.
meanings.sent5: The elderly father of the neighborhood was loved by all for his wisdom.
